text: Ezɨ Saimon Pita ko a ko iti darasi, me osirir me inizir kabar ganigha dɨgavir kuram gami. Saimonɨn roroamning Jems ko Jon, Sebedin otarimning. Aning Saimon ko ingarir gumazimning, aning uaghan dɨgavir kuram gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ Saimon kamaghɨn ganigha, tevimning apɨrigha Iesusɨn suemningɨn boroghɨn irɨ. Egha ghaze, “Ekiam, kɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amim! Kamaghɨn amizɨ nɨ na ategh mangɨ.”
